issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Fix DATE_DIFF regression build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16051](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16051). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Modifying the order to subtract in Arrow implementation for DateDiff function.

 

As is:

Hive implementation: 1st parameter - 2st parameter

Arrow implementation:  2st parameter - 1st parameter.

 

To be:

Hive implementation: 1st parameter - 2st parameter

Arrow implementation:  1st parameter - 2st parameter.
